title: A Secret Between the Two
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Mari-chan, Ruby wants to ask you something.... can Ruby?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! By all means~! But, should you be asking me? Have you already talked to Dia?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, umm, Ruby wants to keep this a secret from Onee-chan, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, you two keep secrets between each other too, huh? Fufu, sure. Mari will definitely keep my promise. So, what is it about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Uhh.... Ruby wants to have a good style like Onee-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Style....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby wants to be like Onee-chan. So Ruby has been eating a lot of vegetables and holding back a little on snacks, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu. Let’s see, don’t stay up late and get a bunch of sleep! The human body grows while they sleep, you know. So you shouldn’t stay up late watching school idol videos. Can you do it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Pigii....! R-, Ruby understands. Ruby will only watch videos until 10 PM! Mari-chan, please please pleeeeease keep this a secret from Onee-chan, okay!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Got it. It’s a secret between Mari and Ruby, just the two of us♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
